snippet: Xiaflex could become the first medicine approved on the basis of solid evidence to ease a condition that makes intercourse difficult or impossible for men.
abstract: Auxilium Pharmaceuticals Xiaflex could become the first medicine approved on the basis of solid evidence to ease Peyronie's disease, a condition that makes intercourse difficult or impossible for men; drug succeeds in two late-stage clinical trials.
lead_paragraph: Xiaflex could become the first medicine approved on the basis of solid evidence to ease a condition that makes intercourse difficult or impossible for men.

headline.seo: Treatment for Peyronie’s Disease Shows Promise
headline.main: Treatment for Penis Curvature Sees Results
